name: Green Aventurine Beads Bracelet
description:
I've always liked to wear many bracelets at one in one of my wrists. Inspired by that, and by the power of stones, I made this line of bracelets. Black and silver chain with a handmade chain of green aventurine beads complete this one of a kind bracelet ready to be worn this spring.

Components:

-Gunmetal chain
-Silver plated chain
-Handmade green aventurine bead chain. Beads are 8mm
-Silver plated lobster clasp
-Gunmetal chain extension
-Gunmental jump rings
-Love :)

Properties of Gree Aventurine: "This is the stone of opportunity. Aventurine is known as the stone of chance or luck. If you gamble or play the lotto, keep this stone in your left pocket.Green Aventurine is the stone of luck and chance. It is said to increase perception and creative insight. It is a heart chakra stone. It is used to aid nearsightedness. Aventurine has a stabilizing effect on the emotions."

Measurements:

8.30 inches (20,85 cm) approx. including the extended chain for personal adjustment.

I've made these line of bracelets using the standard wrist size, which is between 7 and 8.50 inches, and I've added extra links to be adjusted.

name: Resin Necklace Hold my Hand
description:
Unique and handmade necklace made with steel chain, white and pink quartz beads, green jade and a pendant of a vintage image under a coat of resin hand poured. It ends on a silver plated lobster and comes with extra links for a better adjustment.

Measurements: 41cm from one end to the other, including the lobster and extra links.

name: Yellow Cream Universe Ring
description:
A whole mysterious universe of yellow, cream and white pigments in your finger. 

A mix of pigments and resin on a high quality nickel free ring. Adjustable.

name: Rose Quartz Beads Bracelet
description:
I've always liked to wear many bracelets at one in one of my wrists. Inspired by that, and by the power of stones, I made this line of bracelets. Black and silver chain with a handmade chain of rose quartz beads complete this one of a kind bracelet ready to be worn this spring.

Components:

-Gunmetal chain
-Silver plated chain
-Handmade rose quartz bead chain. Beads are 8mm.
-Silver plated lobster clasp
-Gunmetal chain extension
-Gunmental jump rings
-Love :)

Properties of Rose Quartz: "Rose quartz is an excellent heart-healing gemstone. It is a nature remedy that can be used for treating any issue that needs emotional healing. Rose quartz is a pink-colored crystal that carries a very gentle and soothing energy and gives comfort to anyone whose heart has been wounded. Encourages self love, heals emotional body pain, eases heartache, relieves loneliness, releases repressed hurts, promotes forgiveness, offers inner peace..."

Measurements:

8.51 inches (21,80 cm) approx. including the extended chain for personal adjustment.

I've made these line of bracelets using the standard wrist size, which is between 7 and 8.50 inches, and I've added extra links to be adjusted.

NOTE: The third picture it's only there to show how it would look like. It's not the actual bracelet on sale.

name: Real Flowers In Resin
description: Here it is a very special pendant made with real flowers and epoxy resin that will cheer you up in Spring and will be a beautiful addition to your jewelry box. I've grinded many, many little dry redish pink flowers and, using my own technique, I've incorporated it to the epoxy resin mix. I then let it dry and harden for a day inside the pretty shiny silver plated setting. It acts different to the light. Sometimes it looks like I've encapsulated a piece of pink velvet and if you watch closely, you can see the bits of flowers. The color it is all natural, the grinded flowers have naturally tinted the resin and created this unique piece that will never be reproduced ever again. That is part of the wonders of handmade jewelry and working with natural elements. The resin is so clear it acts sometimes as a mirror and will reflect what's in front of it and create beautiful imagery, as you can see in the pictures. The pendant is 25mm or 1 inch and comes with a 16 inch (40.6cm) link chain that is free of nickel and will hang around your neck very nicely. The good thing about resin jewelry is that it will last forever and a day. I wouldn't get it in the shower or a swimming pool though, because of the setting, but the resin is scratch resistant and won't get yellow with time. It will basically be here forever along with cockroaches but let's not think about that. ;)
